description: React component implementing a self-contained car escape/avoidance game using Canvas API, with controls for steering and restarting, including game state management, obstacle spawning, collision detection, and rendering logic.

methods.name: restart
methods.description: Resets game state to initial conditions, including player car position, obstacles, score, and game status flags.

methods.name: spawnObstacle
methods.description: Creates a new obstacle with random lane, size, and speed, and adds it to the obstacles list.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates game state including player movement, obstacle positions, collision detection, and score increment based on elapsed time.

methods.name: rectsOverlap
methods.description: Checks for overlap between two rectangular objects, used for collision detection.

methods.name: draw
methods.description: Renders the game scene including background, lanes, player car, obstacles, and HUD; displays game over overlay if applicable.
